Package edu.rit.p3.data.exception

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException
    Within the BeerJdbcManager.getTokenByUsername(String) and the BeerJdbcManager.getTokenByHash(String) methods (Data Layer), an attempt at finding a User's authentication token with a certain username may not exist.
    BeerNotFoundException
    Within some methods of the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer), an attempt at finding a Beer with a certain name may not exist.
    BeerServiceClosedException
    Within the BeerJdbcManager methods (Data Layer), if a user attempts to perform an action that requires authentication, the token string they pass may be expired.
    MismatchingPasswordException
    Within the BeerController.getToken(String, String) method (Business Layer), an attempt at authenticating a user is made.
    TokenExpiredException
    Within the BeerJdbcManager methods (Data Layer), if a user attempts to perform an action that requires authentication, the token string they pass may be expired.
    UserHasInsufficientPrivilegesException
    Within the BeerController.setPrice(String, double, String) method (Business Layer), an attempt to change a beer price is made.
    UserNotFoundException
    Within some methods of the BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer), an attempt at finding a User with a certain username may not exist.
    UserUnderageException
    Within the BeerJdbcManager.updateUserToken(User) method (Data Layer), an attempt at creating an authorization token for a User with a certain username may not may not be allowed because a user is under a certain age.
